title: Client Not Starting and Zoomed In
body: So, after the new patch 4.20, my LoL has been effectively broken. The patch screen where you see the champion rotation and can repair the game or hit Launch is zoomed in for some reason, so I cant hit the gear or close icons to attempt a repair. Also, when I just hi Launch, the box goes away and the Log In screen never appears. It just doesnt do anything. When I tried setting my  Display options to Small for my icons instead of Medium, It seemed to fix the Zoom In issue, but I do not like having that setting on, I largely prefer Medium Icons. As for the game not wanting to Launch, I've no idea. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
Hello Bowie Sensei!

It seems like you are mentioning two separate issues in your post.  The first issue is the bug currently where if you have your Windows zoom settings set to "Medium" the client will be cut off.  The temporary work-around to this issue is to set it to the standard setting of "small", but this is not a permanent solution.  We are working to make sure that this gets resolved in a future patch, but we don't have any ETA for this just yet :(

As to why the patcher closes and the Log-in screen doesn't appear, this seems to be a separate issue.  It could be due to a corruption of the patcher itself, or your computer being unable to connect to our Log-in servers.  No matter what the the specific root cause is, the steps in this Knowledge Base Article should resolve this issue and get you to see the full glory of the Log-in screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues

If you are still staring at your desktop and getting angrier by the second, open up your browser and [submit a new ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our Tech Team.  They can work with you further one-on-one and get this resolved.  If you do submit a ticket, include the following info:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3

I tried the steps in the 1st link without success, I've opened a ticket with the information you said to include. Hopefully its resolved soon {{champion:32}}
